inclusion.criterion: Fasting Plasma Glucose between 100 mg/dL (5.6 mmol/L) to 125 mg/dL (6.9 mmol/L)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Oral Glucose Tolerance Test 140 mg/dL (7.8 mmol/L) to 199 mg/dL (11.0 mmol/L)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Body Mass Index >25 kg/m2 or >23 kg/m2
inclusion.label: met
met
inclusion.evidence: family history positive for DM type 1 in his uncle and his grandfather

inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: diagnosed with cardiomyopathy that will be treated with ACE inhibitors and Beta blockers

inclusion.criterion: Blood Pressure <140/90 mmHg without therapy for hypertension
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: claims mild dyspnea after climbing 3 floors, no dyspnea at rest and no angina (New York Heart Association class 2)

inclusion.criterion: HDL cholesterol level <0.35 mg/dL (0.90 mmol/L) and/or a triglyceride level >0.250 mg/dL (2.82 mmol/L)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: lab study is as bellow: HDL: 40 mg/dl

exclusion.criterion: Patients with some other chronic degenerative disease like diabetes mellitus 2 with pharmacologic treatment.
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: past medical history is not significant for any other medical issues

exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: claims mild dyspnea after climbing 3 floors, no dyspnea at rest and no angina (New York Heart Association class 2)

notes: Patient has cardiomyopathy that will be treated with ACE inhibitors and Beta blockers. He claims mild dyspnea after climbing 3 floors, no dyspnea at rest and no angina (New York Heart Association class 2).
